form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: TRANSLATION OF EXTRACT OF HOUSEHOLD REGISTRATION (Former), Pei-shih-hsin-hu-tze 036

full_text: TRANSLATION TRANSLATION OF EXTRACT OF HOUSEHOLD REGISTRATION Former) Household No.: Pei-shih-hsin-hu-tze 036 Administrative District and Address: No. 3, Lane 32, Linhsi St. (Lin 3, Hsinshih Li) Chengchung District, Taipei City, Republic of China. Changes of Head of Household: Nil Movements of the Whole Household: Moved out to U. S. A. on Jan. 24, 1957. Head of Household: Name : CHEN, Chi-tung I. D. Card No. : Pei-shih-cheng-hsin-kou-tze 0123 Order of Birth : 1st son Date of Birth : May 22, 1902 Education : Graduated from St. John University, Shanghai Occupation : Technician of JCRR Spouse : CHEN-CHENG, En-tzu Father : CHEN, Wei-ping Mother : CHEN-HAO, Kuei-shun Native Place : Peiping City Remarks : The native place was corrected on May 19, 1952. Member of Household: Name : CHEN-CHENG, En-tzu I. D. Card No. : Pei-shih-cheng-hsin-kou-tze 0124 Relationship : Wife Order of Birth : 1st daughter Date of Birth : October 27, 1909 Education : Graduated from Chinling Girls' University Nanking Occupation : Housekeeping Spouse : CHEN, Chi-tung Father : CHENG, Ching-i Mother : CHENG-CHUNG, I Native Place : Same as the head of household Remarks : The date of birth was corrected on April 27, 1956. This extract is a true and correct copy of the entries in the Household Register. Household Registry of Chengchung District, Taipei City, Republic of China. Chief : TENG, Chen-to (sealed) Date : Sept. 24, 1974 File No. : Pei-shih-cheng-hu-teng-tze 51347 3 The undersigned confirms # to be true and correct that this copy ha s/been translated from the ori- ginal copy in Attested on this day, Oct 19 tytat the Taiwan Taipei Distr ct Lorettal-tan Court Republic cf China, That the signatures/seals in this/attached (2) Translator, ITS it) documents are authentic.
